movies.title: Rubber
movies.plot: Set in a Sumatran plantation, the film focuses on a Dutch newlywed trying adjust to the rough lives in the jungle.
movies.simplePlot: Set in a Sumatran plantation, the film focuses on a Dutch newlywed trying adjust to the rough lives in the jungle.

biography.bio: Jules Verstraete was born on June 20, 1883 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Julien Gustave de Graef. He was an actor, known for Rubber (1936), The Three Wishes (1937) and De laatste dagen van een eiland (1942). He was married to Pauline Brandt. He died on April 29, 1951 in Hilversum, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Jules Verstraete

biography.bio: Enny Meunier was born on April 24, 1912 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Anna Maria Cornelia Josephine Mulder. She was an actress, known for Rubber (1936), De dood van een handelsreiziger (1967) and Malle gevallen (1934). She was married to Maurice van Nieuwenhuizen. She died on June 18, 1996.
biography.name: Enny Meunier

biography.bio: A former matinee idol in Holland and Germany, he fled to America before WWII and portrayed anti-Nazi patriots and continental romancers in Hollywood. Forced to retire after suffering an injury while on stage in Holland 1955, he lived out the rest of his life in relative seclusion. Dogged by ill health (phlebitis) in post-war years, he suffered the first of a series of heart attacks in 1945.
biography.name: Philip Dorn

biography.bio: Georges Spanelly was born on December 25, 1898 in Paris, France. He was an actor, known for Rubber (1936), La Marseillaise (1938) and Le diable boiteux (1948). He died on June 30, 1979 in Paris.
biography.name: Georges Spanelly

biography.bio: Amsy Moina was born on August 28, 1906. She is an actress, known for Rubber (1936) and The Tars (1934).
biography.name: Amsy Moina

biography.bio: Mien Duymaer Van Twist was born on February 26, 1891 in the USA. She was an actress, known for Helleveeg (1920), Wilton's Zoo (1939) and De dans van de reiger (1966). She died on May 14, 1967 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Mien Duymaer Van Twist

biography.bio: Constant van Kerckhoven Jr. was born on April 21, 1892. He was an actor, known for Het geheim van het slot arco (1915), Rubber (1936) and Don Juan (1913). He died on March 25, 1966.
biography.name: Constant van Kerckhoven Jr.

biography.bio: Philippe La Chapelle was born on August 1, 1882 in The Hague, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor, known for Gijsbrecht van Aemstel (1957), Nocturne (1964) and Rubber (1936). He died on July 16, 1969 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands.
biography.name: Philippe La Chapelle

biography.bio: Dolly Mollinger was born on November 6, 1911 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Margot Frédérique Amélie Eugénie Mollinger. She was an actress and writer, known for The Beachcomber (1938), De man zonder hart (1937) and Place de la Concorde (1939). She was married to Schlee, Walter. She died on September 7, 2004 in Port Orchard, Washington, USA.
biography.name: Dolly Mollinger

biography.bio: Tony Van Otterloo was born on March 13, 1910. He was an actor, known for Rubber (1936), Forty Years (1938) and Willem van Oranje (1934). He died on September 26, 1979.
biography.name: Tony Van Otterloo

biography.bio: Elias van Praag was born on June 7, 1884 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands. He was an actor, known for De man zonder hart (1937), Rubber (1936) and Klokslag twaalf (1936). He died on December 16, 1942 in Mauthausen, Germany.
biography.name: Elias van Praag

biography.bio: Jan Hahn was born on February 16, 1902 in Amsterdam, Noord-Holland, Netherlands as Jan Hendrik Hahn. He was an actor, known for Rubber (1936), 't was een april (1936) and Swiebertje (1955). He died on November 21, 1963 in Laren, Netherlands.
biography.name: Jan Hahn

biography.bio: Leo de Hartogh was born on June 2, 1916 in Rotterdam, Zuid-Holland, Netherlands as Leopold de Hartogh. He was an actor, known for Young Hearts (1936), De wachters bij het graf (1960) and Zomerzotheid (1936). He was married to Teddy Schaank. He died on October 5, 2007 in The Hague, Zuid-Holland.
biography.name: Leo de Hartogh

biography.bio: Mohammad Rasjid is an actor, known for Rubber (1936).
biography.name: Mohammad Rasjid

biography.bio: Daan Van Olleffen was born on July 18, 1886. He was an actor, known for De laatste dagen van een eiland (1942), Willem van Oranje (1934) and Rubber (1936). He died on November 12, 1959.
biography.name: Daan Van Olleffen
